title: Use distributive property
text: Use distributive property to rewrite the expression $$\frac{63m^4-42m^3}{\left(-7m^2\right)}=\frac{63m^4}{negneg}\left(7m^2\right)}-\frac{42m^3}{\operatorname{\left(-7m^2\right)}$$

title: Use distributive property
text: As a reminder, the distributive law states $$\left(a-b\right) c=a c-b c$$

title: Use distributive property
text: in this case, we can see divided by $$\left(-7m^2\right)$$ as multiply by $$\frac{1}{\left(-7m^2\right)}$$, $$a=63m^4$$ , $$b=42m^3$$, $$c=\frac{1}{\left(-7m^2\right)}$$

title: Simplify each term in expression
text: As a reminder, the power rule states for any integer m, n and real number a, $$\frac{a^m}{a^n}=a^{m-n}$$

title: Combine the simplified terms
text: As our last step, we can put the simplified terms back to the $$expression}\left(\frac{63m^4}{\operatorname{negneg}\left(7m^2\right)}\right)-\frac{42m^3}{\operatorname{\left(-7m^2\right)}$$

subHints.title: Combine the simplified terms
subHints.text: in the expression $$\frac{63m^4}{negneg}\left(7m^2\right)}-\frac{42m^3}{\operatorname{\left(-7m^2\right)}$$, replace $$\frac{63m^4}{\left(-7m^2\right)}$$ with $$-9m^2$$, and replace $$\frac{42m^3}{\left(-7m^2\right)}$$ with $$-6m$$ then we yield a new expression
